result.author: Michael Safi in Sydney and Tania Branigan in Beijing
result.title: MH370: possible black box 'pings' spur on search for missing airliner
result.opening: Australian and Chinese vessels have both picked up acoustic "pings" that could be from the black box of missing Malaysia Airlines flight MH370, search officials have announced.

result.author: Bridie Jabour
result.title: Abbott claims vindication on carbon tax from Senate vote in Western Australia
result.opening: Tony Abbott has not interpreted the swing against the government in Western Australia as a message from the electorate on the carbon tax, saying the Coalition is as determined as ever to scrap it.

result.author: Bridie Jabour
result.title: Free-trade deal with Japan not a certainty, says Tony Abbott
result.opening: Tony Abbott has cast doubt on whether or not he will secure a free-trade agreement with Japan on his Asian visit because negotiations have apparently stalled on the issue of agriculture.

result.author: Bridie Jabour
result.title: Tony Abbott leaves door open on aged pension changes
result.opening: Tony Abbott has left the door open to making changes to the aged pension after reports the Commission of Audit recommended it be indexed differently.
